{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-HC |revision=1 |asin=B078RSPF2M, B0761Z11CV |price=49 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |manif= |est_release_date=08/2017 |type=single-board computer, mobile NAS |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=Exynos 5422;Exynos 5 Octa; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4-2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=8 |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L512EMI-10G |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=PoP |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=no |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8153 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 3.1 to SATA 6Gb/s Bridge Controller;JMicron;JMS578;;1;,,, Simple 5V eFuse Protection Switch;TI;TPS259251;;1;,,, PMIC for 2.7-5.0V;Samsung;S2MPS11;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery backup, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.05; |stock_os=Linux;4.9.44-56;Ubuntu 16.04; |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), Armbian, Debian, DietPi, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=odroid |default_pass=odroid |oui_eth=00:1E:06 }} {{TagLine|Home Cloud One - ODROID-HC1}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/shop/odroid-hc1-home-cloud-one/ Product page]
{{See also|ODROID|List of SBCs}}
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/08/21/hardkernel-odroid-hc1-home-cloud-one-stackable-nas-is-now-available-for-49/ ''Hardkernel ODROID-HC1 Home Cloud One Stackable NAS'' on '''CNX|Software'''] :RAM is LPDDR3 PoP with processor
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Samsung]] ''Exynos'' 5422 (5 Octa) :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz + :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :SATA3 via USB3 Bridge *RAM: 2GB LPDDR3 @933MHz
===See also=== *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel Celeron'' J4105 4-cores @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU
